entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 80
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
